00011 #include "CfbRebridgeMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00013 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00014 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00015 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00016 #endif
00017 #include <mcMd/species/Linear.h>
00018 #include <util/boundary/Boundary.h>
00019 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00020 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Bond.h>
00021 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00022 #include <util/global.h>

00024 namespace McMd

00027    using namespace Util;

00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    CfbRebridgeMove::CfbRebridgeMove(McSystem& system) : 
00033       CfbRebridgeBase(system),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       nRegrow_(-1)
00036    {} 
00037    
00038    /* 
00039    * Read parameters speciesId, nRegrow, and nTrial
00040    */
00041    void CfbRebridgeMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00042    {
00043       // Read parameters
00044       readProbability(in);
00045       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00046       read<int>(in, "nRegrow", nRegrow_);
00047 
00048       // Read parameters hold by RebridgeBase
00049       CfbRebridgeBase::readParam(in);
00050 
00051       // Initialize tables for spring constants and normalizations.
00052       setup();
00053 
00054       // Use dynamic_cast to check that the Species is actually a Linear species
00055       Linear* chainPtr;
00056       chainPtr = dynamic_cast<Linear*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00057   
00058       // Allocate array to store old positions 
00059       oldPos_.allocate(nRegrow_); 
00060    }
00061 
00062 
00063    /* 
00064    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00065    *
00066    * Convention for index
00067    *       head of molecule                tail of molecule
00068    *          |                                   |
00069    *          0   1   2   3 ...                length-1
00070    *          o---o---o---o---o---o---o---o---o---o
00071    *              |_______________|___________|
00072    *                valid beginId    nRegrow
00073    *
00074    */
00075    bool CfbRebridgeMove::move() 
00076    {
00077       Molecule *molPtr;   // pointer to randomly chosen molecule
00078       Atom     *thisPtr;  // pointer to the current end atom
00079       int       length, sign, beginId, endId, i;
00080       int       *bonds;
00081       double    rosen_r,  rosen_f;
00082       double    energy_r, energy_f;
00083       bool      accept;
00084 
00085       incrementNAttempt();
00086 
00087       // Choose a molecule at random
00088       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00089       length = molPtr->nAtom();
00090 
00091       // Require that chain length - 2 >= nRegrow_
00092       if (nRegrow_ > length - 2) {
00093          UTIL_THROW("nRegrow_  >= chain length");
00094       }
00095 
00096       // Allocate bonds array
00097       bonds = new int[nRegrow_ + 1];
00098 
00099       // Choose the beginId of the growing interior bridge
00100       beginId = random().uniformInt(1, length - nRegrow_);
00101 
00102       // Choose direction: sign = +1 if beginId < endId
00103       if (random().uniform(0.0, 1.0) > 0.5) {
00104          sign = +1;
00105          endId = beginId + (nRegrow_ - 1);
00106       } else {
00107          sign = -1;
00108          endId   = beginId;
00109          beginId = endId + (nRegrow_ - 1);
00110       }
00111 
00112       // Store current atomic positions from segment to be regrown
00113       thisPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00114       for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00115          oldPos_[i] = thisPtr->position();
00116          thisPtr += sign;
00117       }
00118 
00119       // Get bond types.
00120       if (sign == +1) {
00121          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_ + 1; ++i)
00122             bonds[i] = molPtr->bond(endId - i).typeId();
00123       } else {
00124          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_ + 1; ++i)
00125             bonds[i] = molPtr->bond(endId - 1 + i).typeId();
00126       }
00127 
00128       // Delete atoms: endId -> beginId
00129       thisPtr = &(molPtr->atom(endId));
00130       deleteSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosen_r, energy_r);
00131 
00132       // Regrow atoms: endId -> beginId
00133       thisPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00134       addSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosen_f, energy_f);
00135 
00136       // Release bonds array
00137       delete [] bonds;
00138 
00139       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00140       accept = random().metropolis(rosen_f/rosen_r);
00141       if (accept) {
00142 
00143          // Increment counter for accepted moves of this class.
00144          incrementNAccept();
00145 
00146          // If the move is accepted, keep current positions.
00147 
00148       } else {
00149 
00150          // If the move is rejected, restore old positions
00151          thisPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00152          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00153             //system().moveAtom(*thisPtr, oldPos_[i]);
00154             thisPtr->position() = oldPos_[i];
00155             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00156             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*thisPtr);
00157             #endif
00158             thisPtr += sign;
00159          }
00160    
00161       }
00162 
00163       return accept;
00164    }
00165 }
00166 #endif
